definitions.definition: ( ichthyology , countable ) Any scaleless, predatory fish of the superorder Selachimorpha , with a cartilaginous skeleton and 5 to 7 gill slits on each side of its head.
( uncountable ) Flesh of this animal , consumed as food .
( countable ) Various other fishes that resemble true sharks in appearance and/or behaviour :

subdefinitions.definition: ( inexact ) A ghost shark , also called a chimaera (any fish in order Chimaeriformes )
( inexact ) A spiny shark (any extinct fish in the paraphyletic grade † Acanthodii , which is also considered a class.)

A freshwater shark . Any fish in the genus Epalzeorhynchos . Any fish in the genus Balantiocheilos . An iridescent shark ( Pangasianodon hypophthalmus ). A roseline shark ( Dawkinsia denisonii ). A paroon shark ( Pangasius sanitwongsei ).

definitions.definition: ( countable ) A noctuid moth of species Cucullia umbratica .
( UK , university slang , countable ) A university student who is not a fresher that has engaged in sexual activity with a fresher; usually habitually and with multiple people.

main_definition: ( ichthyology , countable ) Any scaleless, predatory fish of the superorder Selachimorpha , with a cartilaginous skeleton and 5 to 7 gill slits on each side of its head.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Flesh of this animal , consumed as food .
( countable ) Various other fishes that resemble true sharks in appearance and/or behaviour :
( countable ) A noctuid moth of species Cucullia umbratica .
( UK , university slang , countable ) A university student who is not a fresher that has engaged in sexual activity with a fresher; usually habitually and with multiple people.

definitions.definition: Someone who exploits others, for example by trickery , lies , usury , extortion .
A relentless and resolute person or group, especially in business .
A person that excels in a particular field.

subdefinitions.definition: A very good poker or pool player. Compare fish (a bad poker player).

definitions.definition: A person who feigns ineptitude to win money from others.

main_definition: Someone who exploits others, for example by trickery , lies , usury , extortion .
secondary_definitions: ( informal , derogatory ) A sleazy and amoral lawyer .
( informal ) A relentless and resolute person or group, especially in business .
A person that excels in a particular field.
( sports and games ) A person who feigns ineptitude to win money from others.
